title: Founder & Full Stack Developer
description: Design and development of a complete event management solution (ticketing, registration, check-in). Focus on adapting to the African market with integration of local payment methods and optimized UX. Gradual deployment and implementation of a marketing strategy.

title: Software Developer Internship
description: Learning the fundamentals of modeling: class diagram, specifications, case diagram, UML method, conceptual data model (CDM), logical data model (LDM).

title: Software Engineering Student & Tech Enthusiast
description: Learning the fundamentals of software development: algorithms, LaTeX for scientific writing, setting up development environments (Gradle, Flutter, Dart SDK, etc.).
